author: yojo
title: Distributed Autonomous Accelerator
description: The typical accelerator model is not adapted to a global distributed system and structurally underfunds underrepresented communities.
solution: Conduct a research project for a radical decentralized blockchain accelerator that nurtures teams that are worth investing in any context.
experience: For over a decade we've been running entrepreneur incubation & acceleration programmes. We advise startups & co-found fintech ventures.
